cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to 0 will cause the CU to fail during initialization as it requires at least one thread for PUSCH processing.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid value 'debug_invalid' will cause logging configuration failure and prevent the DU from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為無效值 'debug_invalid' 會導致日誌配置失敗，並阻止 DU 正確啟動。
